summary: I'm a jack of all trades, master of none. I love to learn new things by [reading](https://goodreads.com/renedeanda), asking lots of questions, and building new things that help others. I also love [photography](https://unsplash.com/@renedeanda). Welcome!

endorsements.name: Bob Pike, International Fitness Expert, PikesFitness.com
endorsements.text: "I have the privilege of currently working closely with Ren√© to relaunch my personal brand and home fitness program online. He has proven to me his knowledge and skill when creating my new marketing strategy powered by new technologies. Ren√© has been easy to work with and increased my limited knowledge clearly explaining the full functionality of his process. He took the necessary time to learn my story and adapt it for my online presence. With his experience in marketing, technology, and ability to communicate & explain complex topics, you won‚Äôt go wrong choosing Ren√© to join your team."

endorsements.name: Dr. Andrew Hosmanek, Professor & Attorney, HawkeyeLaw
endorsements.text: "I have had the pleasure of knowing Ren√© for several years now, and being a mentor to him. He was one of my outstanding MBA students, and we made a real connection that has continued since his graduation. Ren√© is creative, hard-working, open-minded, and super intelligent. In addition to establishing a strong record of employment in business, he has started a number of really interesting projects geared toward helping people and improving the world. Over the past several years I have seen him grow and mature as a businessperson, focus his ideas, and create fascinating products. I highly recommend working with Ren√©. He has global experience combined with a Midwestern work ethic and kindness."

endorsements.name: Rachael Guerriere, Program Manager, Lockheed Martin
endorsements.text: "Ren√© has always been an innovative, hardworking, project-oriented teammate and climbing professional colleague. It was a great honor to start our professional careers together as interns at Verizon working cross-collaboratively in a virtual environment across the U.S. in the 2000s. Ren√© developed research and project management skills through our intern project where we had to engage with other interns on phone calls to finish leadership presentations and complete a white paper on remote work, mobility, and telecommuting. Clearly, we were 10 years ahead of the trend :) I have confidence in Ren√©'s ability to manage a project working with people across regions to deliver products and results...just as he did early in his career. Can't wait to see what company is lucky to gain such a valuable asset to their organization!"

endorsements.name: Michael Williams, Manager Ops Talent Acquisition, Amazon
endorsements.text: "Ren√© was a team leader in the Iowa MBA Consulting program. Ren√©'s curiosity and willingness to learn stand out as strengths. He questions decisions thoughtfully and searches for the larger issues to solve when presented with problems. That mentality will continue to serve Ren√© and future employers well in the the future."

endorsements.name: George Zastrow, Data Solutions Engineer, Verizon Wireless
endorsements.text: "I immediately recognized and admired Ren√©'s eagerness to learn, his organizational skills and his ability to listen and identify the needs of our customers. The solutions that Ren√© helped design and implement while we worked together at Verizon Wireless reflect the qualities of a solutions architect and engineer looking to do the right things, not only for our customers but also keeping in mind the Verizon Wireless network. Ren√© is very passionate and has a desire to do things well. He is a dedicated, hard-working and has a strong aspiration to learn and grow."

endorsements.name: Sammy Abusada, Supply Chain Manager, HNI
endorsements.text: "I would like to take this opportunity to recommend Ren√© DeAnda. I have worked with Ren√© on critical projects for HNI. I know him well in terms of his technical expertise and I assure you about him for having all good skills required to preform complicated tasks. He has incredible team work and leadership characteristics. Ren√© has a wonderful personality with full enthusiasm as well as inspiring and motivating personality. I highly recommend Ren√© and hope you will carefully consider him for any opportunity."

endorsements.name: Sharon Blevins, Project Manager, Verizon
endorsements.text: "Ren√© came to my group in Verizon's data center department as his post-college career training program. He was extremely diligent in learning the ins and outs of setting up new corporate client‚Äôs leased colocation spaces and how to transition them to ongoing support. I have the upmost respect for his work ethic and attention to all details, as well as his newer endeavors developing an innovative app. I highly recommend him to any employer. "

theme.quote: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." - Oscar Wilde
